predictions.text: Either the U.S. House Financial Services Committee or the U.S. Senate Banking Committee will hold a public hearing explicitly focused on the DOJ/prosecutor inquiry into Fed Chair Jerome Powell and implications for Federal Reserve independence, by 2026-04-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A hearing occurs and the official hearing title OR opening statement by the chair/ranking member OR at least one invited witness’s written testimony explicitly references a DOJ/prosecutor 'investigation/inquiry' into Powell (or equivalent) and 'Fed independence'. Committee website must post the hearing record/notice.
monitoring_signals: House Financial Services and Senate Banking hearing calendars/notices
Requests for Fed witnesses/testimony announced by committee leadership
Major outlets reporting committee plans to examine Powell inquiry/Fed independence
predictions.rationale: A public DOJ inquiry touching the Fed chair creates bipartisan incentives for oversight hearings framed around institutional independence and market stability.

predictions.text: Jerome Powell will publicly testify (live or prepared written testimony) before Congress and explicitly reference the DOJ/prosecutor inquiry into him (or 'criminal investigation/probe') AND the term 'independence' in the same testimony, by 2026-06-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A transcript/video or published written testimony from an official congressional hearing shows Powell explicitly referencing a DOJ/prosecutor investigation/inquiry/probe into him and also uses the word 'independence' (Fed independence) within the same testimony document.
monitoring_signals: Congressional testimony scheduling for Fed Chair (semiannual testimony, special hearings)
Fed Board/Chair public calendar and speech schedule
Press reporting on whether Powell will appear before Congress on the inquiry
predictions.rationale: If Congress convenes hearings, Powell is likely to address the issue directly, but legal constraints may limit explicit wording.

predictions.text: The Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or above 30.0 on at least one U.S. trading day, by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Cboe’s published closing value for VIX (ticker VIX) is >= 30.0 on at least one session dated on/before 2026-03-31.
monitoring_signals: Daily VIX closes and intraday spikes
Headlines on Fed politicization / investigation escalation
Equity index drawdowns and rate-volatility measures (MOVE index)
predictions.rationale: Rates/central-bank credibility shocks often spill into equity volatility; the threshold is high but reachable during acute policy uncertainty.

predictions.text: The Refinitiv/CoreCommodity CRB Index (TRCCRB) will close at least 15.0% higher than its close on 2026-01-12, on any trading day by 2026-06-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Using the TRCCRB daily close series, identify the close on 2026-01-12 as baseline. This resolves YES if any daily close on/before 2026-06-30 is >= baseline * 1.15.
monitoring_signals: Broad commodity index performance (CRB, BCOM)
Oil and industrial metals price trends
China credit/industrial activity data and supply disruption headlines
predictions.rationale: ‘Supercycle’ narratives reflect momentum; a +15% half-year move is plausible but requires sustained strength across energy/metals rather than a single spike.

predictions.text: U.S. Treasury (OFAC) will designate at least 5 Venezuela-linked individuals and/or entities in a single action explicitly tied to controlling/diverting Venezuelan oil revenues or restricting support to Cuba, by 2026-05-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A single OFAC action (press release + SDN list update) on/before 2026-05-31 adds >=5 Venezuela-linked names and the official Treasury/OFAC description explicitly references Venezuelan oil revenue control/diversion and/or curbing Venezuela’s support to Cuba.
monitoring_signals: OFAC press releases and SDN list updates
U.S. administration statements on Venezuela oil revenues/Cuba
Reporting on enforcement actions targeting intermediaries/shipping/finance
predictions.rationale: If policy centers on oil-revenue leverage, sanctions expansion is a standard tool; the numeric threshold ensures the action is meaningful.

predictions.text: The U.S. State Department will publish a Federal Register notice designating at least one Mexico-based cartel as a Foreign Terrorist Organization (FTO), by 2026-06-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A Federal Register notice (or State Department formal designation notice) on/before 2026-06-30 adds at least one Mexico-based cartel (e.g., Sinaloa, CJNG, etc.) to the FTO list under INA 219.
monitoring_signals: State Department announcements and Federal Register notices
Congressional briefings on cartel terrorism tools
Treasury/DOJ rhetoric shifting toward terrorism authorities
predictions.rationale: Escalating security rhetoric increases the odds of terrorism-label tools, but legal/diplomatic blowback makes this far from certain.

predictions.text: The Allegiant–Sun Country acquisition will receive U.S. antitrust clearance without a DOJ lawsuit (i.e., HSR early termination or expiration without a Second Request, OR parties publicly state they received all required U.S. antitrust approvals), by 2026-07-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Company press release/SEC filing states HSR waiting period terminated/expired without a Second Request or that all U.S. antitrust approvals were received; and there is no DOJ complaint filed to block the transaction through 2026-07-31.
monitoring_signals: HSR timing disclosures in 8-K/10-Q filings
DOJ Antitrust Division public statements on airline consolidation
Route overlap analyses and competitor complaints
predictions.rationale: ULCC overlap is limited in many city pairs, supporting clearance, but airline deals can attract scrutiny over pricing and slot/airport constraints.

predictions.text: Google will publish a public developer specification for 'commerce agents' (agent-to-agent shopping/checkout protocol) AND at least one additional top-20 U.S. e-commerce retailer (by online sales) besides Walmart will publicly announce adoption/pilot integration, by 2026-09-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Google-hosted documentation/spec is publicly accessible and explicitly describes a commerce-agent protocol. Separately, a top-20 U.S. e-commerce retailer issues a press release/blog post confirming adoption or a live pilot integration referencing the protocol.
monitoring_signals: Google developer blogs, GitHub repos, or standards submissions
Retailer partnership announcements involving Gemini/Google Cloud shopping agents
SDK/API releases and merchant platform integrations
predictions.rationale: If Google/Walmart are pushing agentic commerce, network effects require at least one more major retailer; the technical standard may still fragment across ecosystems.

predictions.text: Boeing will report at least 60 commercial airplane deliveries in a single calendar month during 2026, in its official monthly 'Orders & Deliveries' update, by 2026-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Boeing’s published monthly 'Orders & Deliveries' table shows deliveries >= 60 for any month dated Jan–Oct 2026 (inclusive), posted on Boeing’s website/media materials.
monitoring_signals: Monthly Boeing orders/deliveries releases
737 MAX and 787 production-rate guidance updates
Supply-chain and FAA quality/safety developments
predictions.rationale: With a stated ramp plan and improving deliveries, a 60+ month is achievable if quality gates and supplier constraints don’t re-tighten.

predictions.text: Norway’s government will announce a dedicated Svalbard/High North security and critical-infrastructure package totaling at least NOK 2.0 billion in new funding (not previously budgeted), by 2026-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: An official Norwegian government press release/budget document on/before 2026-12-31 announces new allocations totaling >= NOK 2.0B explicitly tied to Svalbard/High North security, surveillance, communications, ports, or other critical infrastructure; must be described as new funding beyond existing baselines.
monitoring_signals: Norwegian budget updates and Ministry of Defence announcements
High North/Svalbard policy statements and parliamentary debates
NATO/Arctic security incidents and infrastructure vulnerability reporting
predictions.rationale: Rising Arctic competition can trigger discrete spending packages, but Norway may prefer incremental budget lines rather than a single large, labeled package.
